name: The Auto Sort Is Broken
description: Set in a universe parodying poorly managed MMORPGs, even the inventory sort feature has stopped working. It's now up to you to organize the players' messy bags and handle their occasional complaints.

name: Walk Zero1
description: The distant future... There are almost no people left on planet Earth, everyone has moved to Mars. The age of prosperity, the age of robots, androids, technology. And then one day, robot Zero1 decided to take a walk around planet Earth. What awaits him? Desert? Vast forests? Who will he meet on his way? All this is to be found out in the walking simulator.

name: Took: The Immortal Hero
description: A hardcore 2D action platformer developed by one person. Play as a memoryless rabbit TOOK to explore the vast Moon Cave world and defeat dozens of powerful enemies, collect the treasures scattered in this world and regain the glory of the Moon Up Group!

name: The Demon Lord’s Daughter and the Tower of Seals
description: In the wake of the Demon Lord’s defeat, his daughter, Lilina, finds herself leading a miserable existence without any of the comforts of the castle she once called home. Now she has to make an honest living while seeking out six fabled talismans in an attempt to regain her lost powers!

name: Method of Entry
description:
"Method of Entry" is an upcoming 5v5 tactical shooter aimed at revitalizing the genre with a focus on competitive play, enhanced by authentic mechanics. The game's development is guided by our 'C.F.R.F' principle: 'Competitive First, Realism Follows,' which prioritizes competitive elements in gameplay decisions and design.

MoE is designed to be accessible and engaging, avoiding the complex hero abilities or arcade-style power-ups that have infiltrated the genre, and instead emphasizing realistic Special Forces or Counter-Terrorist scenarios that enforce, or dare we say, demand genuine skill. Drawing inspiration from foundational titles like the SWAT and the Rainbow 6 series, as well as classics like Counter-Strike and contemporary games like Escape from Tarkov and Rainbow Six Siege, "Method of Entry" taps into a deep well of tactical shooter heritage.

This project is a response to the competitive community's desire for a streamlined, 5v5 tactical shooter where competitive elements take precedence. Realism is then seamlessly integrated, with attention to weapon dynamics, player movement, environmental design, hit detection, and overall intensity. However, this integration never overshadows MoE’s core competitive mechanics, ensuring a balanced and stable competitive experience.

name: Donkey Konga 1+2 Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubic Odyssey
description: Embark on a galactic journey in Cubic Odyssey, an open-world adventure where you explore vibrant planets, craft tools, build vehicles, and fight the Red Darkness. Uncover ancient mysteries, and shape a universe full of life, danger, and limitless possibilities!

name: Nautikin Adventures
description: You are the Nautikins, the dominant species on this ocean planet! Build boats, planes, and helicopters to explore a vast sea filled with islands and mysteries. Play in a sandbox with unlimited parts or a campaign where you strive to reach your goals. Embark with online multiplayer or singleplayer.

name: MeiaUm: Escaping the Pix
description: In MeiaUm: Escaping the Pix, you dive into a digital world where precious bits are scattered across every level. Your mission? Collect them—but there's a big risk: the Pix. One touch from this ruthless system can be fatal, and the threat is always lurking. As you progress, the challenges grow tougher, and you'll need agility and sharp thinking to dodge the danger and grab all the bits before the Pix catches you. Every move could be your last chance.

name: Laser Tag Massacre
description: Halloween night turns deadly when five friends decide to throw a party in an abandoned arcade deep in rural Campinas, Brazil. What was meant to be just a game turns into their worst nightmare, proving that sometimes, play time can be deadly.

name: In Ashes
description: An unexpected quest has reached your sleepy town. Once again, you must raise your weapon and step into the boots of a weary, burnt out adventurer. When faced with a choice, what kind of hero will you be? In Ashes is a choice-driven fantasy visual novel about adventurers, monsters, and the forgotten.

name: Solomania
description: Solomania is a romance drama about flawed heroes and their collateral damage. With your new reluctant partner, prove that you're not as messed up as everyone thinks. Your mission? Investigate a strange civilian report in the woods, smoothly and without issue. Playing nice is optional.

name: Jump on the Ball
description:
Try and balance on the ball for more than FIVE seconds! Can you beat all three WHACKY levels?!

Jump on the Ball is the first video game launch from indie studios Literally Nothing and Twitzor Games. What started as an idea for a meme game quickly turned into reality as it became a mission to release a first game, no matter how simple or mundane.

name: StompyBoy
description: Pilot a big stompy mech, and shoot other big stompy mechs with your various lasers. That's about it.

name: CitaDrill
description: Captain a giant drill in this basebuilder roguelite with a combination of action and strategy! Build, explore, and survive in a world inspired by 1-bit aesthetics. Who will win: the abyss and its fearsome tests, or your mettle and paw-some cat crew?

name: Paca Paca Passion Special
description:
The third title in Japan-only rhythm game series Pacapaca Passion.

Paca Paca Passion Special is the third and last game in the Paca Paca Passion series of music games made by Namco and that are conversion of Arcade Machines made too by Namco. In the game the player controls again one (but any of them can be choose) of four music group members and have to try to follow and play each melody that are featured in each game stage. Each group member play a different instrument: piano (Milka), keyboards (Plica), guitar (Cork) or drums (Geroppa). And the game difficulty is different depending of which instrument are choose. The game features different melodies and game modes, and also a vs mode against a computer or another human player. Since this is the latest one in the series the game features the best graphics in the series with good cartoon 3d graphics.

name: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - Genesis
description: Experience the beginning of the "Lost Traces" series through the eyes of Evelyn Strom in an immersive first-person view. Explore and collect clues to assist you in the search for Evelyn’s brother and help you unravel the mystery of what is really going on.

name: Global Transport
description: Global Transport is a fun and engaging game that will test your problem-solving and time-management skill

name: Subway Exorcist Girl
description: A subway train plagued by strange occurrences. A part-time exorcist girl arrives to confront the supernatural chaos, with the unknown ahead.

name: Distant
description: Imagine yourself diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. How would you see the world? What emotions would you experience? What would your symptoms look like? Answer these questions yourself by playing in the shoes of someone with the disease, first-person.

name: Suspense: Madman's Dreams
description: This psychological adventure, focused on narrative, is based on a scientific representation of mental disorders. Are you ready to face the fears of people suffering from mental illnesses? Use your voice as the voice of the main character to get as close to them as possible.

name: Living With It
description:
Welcome
Instructions for this training will be delivered via memo.

name: The Flayed Man
description: The Flayed Man is a short narrative-driven point and click horror game. Awaking without memories (or skin), you must uncover the sins of the past, pass judgement, and decide your fate in this macabre adventure.

name: Rocket Hat
description: Sin descripción

name: Salvagers
description: A 3rd person game centred around escort missions where you play as a hero trying to save as many people as they can in the middle of a mass take over within 6 minutes. rescue all 15 civilians in the shortest amount of time possible.

name: Skye Revival
description: A cyberpunk 2D Beat Em Up Platformer by Komic Studios. Control Vega, a Skye City Defender and restore your city from corruption.

name: Big's Fishing Quest
description: One day Big the Cat was going to fish on his favorite fishing river and he noticed that the river was polluted and all the fishes were gone! So he begin a quest to find the culprits and make justice

name: Sproing
description:
Sproing is a foddian-inspired speedrun rage bouncing physics platformer.

Take control of an evolving alien creature as you escape an experimental bio lab, bouncing your way up through an alien planet, mutating with new abilities, to reach your space ship and launch off planet.

Developed by Funk Games, currently in Alpha state, released on itch: https://funkgames.itch.io/sproing

name: Blades, Bows & Magic
description: Sin descripción

name: Toasty Tires
description:
You're playing with your toys in your bedroom when your parent comes in and asks you to clean up. Can you pick up your room and escape before it's too late? Or take your car for a spin in endless mode, where the carpet is never-ending. Just enjoy the ride.

Zip around the carpet and hardwood floor across Five unique levels as things get weirder and weirder. Explore and maybe by the end you'll uncover what's wrong with your parent before it's too late. Add avocado (and a little extra challenge) to your Toasty Tires experience with Avocado Edition!

name: Yet Another Killing Game
description: Inspired by popular mystery adventure game series such as Ace Attorney, Danganronpa, and Zero Escape, YAKG's gameplay offers a mix of immersive dialogue branches, point-and-click room investigations, and some mystery solving--if you can keep everyone from killing each other!

name: Super Pickleball Adventure
description:
As an aspiring pickleball champion, you've got to work your way up the ranks. Explore the world and defeat enemies with unique styles to get to the top! Think you can dethrone the pickleball GOAT?

The fast-paced sports game was created by Andrfw. The game came out near the end of 2022 and has already become one of the most popular pickleball games online.

name: The Little Moon
description: Storytelling, Side-scroller, Universe, Travel, Fishing, Action, Adventure.

name: AgarIO Hub Rebirth
description:
An agar-style game with many new features and social profiles.

The original AgarIO Hub, created by BielSAA in October 2015, was shut down in early 2019. In October 2023, the community recreated the game to allow everyone to relive their nostalgia.

The game is now owned by Py9 and Chance.

name: Mr. Jong
description: A mahjong puzzle-action game with sliding block and maze elements. Players control Mr. Jong to make mahjong hands by pushing tiles into a pit at the top of the screen while also avoiding ogres in pursuit. Mr. Jong can temporarily defeat the ogres by crushing them with shoved tiles (similar to Pengo), or by collecting a special power tile and tagging an ogre (similar to Pac-Man).

name: Parkour Civilization
description: Progress from a noob to a god by mastering parkour courses, crafting parkour gadgets, and solving parkour puzzles.

name: Cop Drop
description:
Inspired by 2048 and merge game mechanics, this fast-paced game will challenge your reflexes and strategy.

Merge police heads to create larger characters!
Avoid getting stuck – if the screen fills up, it’s game over!
Climb the leaderboard and set high scores!
Frenzy Mode – trigger chaos and make rapid merges!

name: CarX Drift Racing 3
description:
Assemble your very own unique drift car, adjust every part, and conquer iconic tracks! Burn rubber, tune your car, and win. Become a legend in the world of drifting!

Welcome to the world of drift, now in your pocket!

CarX Drift Racing 3 is the long-awaited sequel in the legendary game series from developer CarX Technologies. Assemble your very own unique drift car from scratch and compete in tandem races with players all over the world!

name: Zumba: The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure
description: Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure.

name: Witch of the Meta Loop
description: This is a Roguelike adventure game with Meta elements. You are a witch, yet not a witch. Step through the magic mirror, break the fourth wall, and uncover the real you!

name: Zombie Blitz
description: This ruined Earth sees movement once more?! In the midst of waves of robots waking once more, the zombies' solo struggle begins in this action roguelike!

name: Puzzle Adventures: Sea Animals
description: Easy to use puzzles for toddlers and kids. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Mr. Sensei: Life as a Foreign Teacher in Japan
description: Decide the fate of a teacher! Every decision influences his relationships and leads to unique endings. Which will you choose?

name: Mini Market Design
description: Build your dream market and welcome your customers!

name: Masked Devourer
description: Unravel the secret of this town and that uncanny mask!

name: Lush Forest
description: Stunning adventure!

name: Puzzle Adventures: Serve Dishes
description: Easy to use puzzles for toddlers and kids. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Santa's Adventure: Christmas Gifts Rush
description: Dash, collect and celebrate!

name: Sky Diving: Parachute Flight Simulator
description: Soar, freefall, Conquer the Skies!

name: Star Rush: Stack & Jump
description: Just stack boxes, jump, and collect stars! Easy, right?

name: Treflix: Mini Games
description: Cute and sweet games for everyone!

name: Vampire Waifu Puzzles
description: Create stunning anime vampire waifu art through puzzles!

name: Windborn: Wings of Fate
description: Soar through the sky and master the wind!

name: Arcade Archives: Final Star Force
description:
"FINAL STAR FORCE" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1992.
Two thousand years after the previous work, you will take on the final battle against the resurrected nemesis, GORDESS.
Your ship Final Star II will gradually power up over time. Strengthen it to the maximum to obtain unrivaled strength!

name: 2222 Abyss of the Universe
description: In the year 2222, the Earth we loved has been devastated. We set out on an endless journey to search for a new planet to inhabit. You will embark on a journey aboard a spaceship. The spaceship has evolved and requires fuel in the shape of rings.

name: Artifact Seeker
description: Artifact Seeker is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game.You can obtain artifacts by slaying enemies. Use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods or to end the game ? Your choice.

name: Card Collector Trading Shop
description: Play the role of a collector turned business owner. Open a card market and become rich.

name: Casual Sport Series: Tennis
description: Ready your racket, find your rhythm, and dominate the court!

name: English Sensei: Teaching in Japan
description: Take control of a young teacher's destiny! Each decision will influence her relationships and lead her to discover unique endings. Which will you choose?

name: Hentai Girls: Pissy Pirate
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Hoarding Simulator 2.0
description: Sleep, train, ride a bike—almost anything is possible in this game. All you need to do is collect!

name: Idol Symphony
description: Melodies, outfits and puzzles – the bright show begins!

name: InorStreet
description: A short shooting RPG where you destroy non-aggressive enemies called "Inorganic"

name: Losen Screws Puzzles
description: Solve over 100 tricky screw puzzles und unsrew them all!

name: Cho Aniki Collection
description:
Have you been hitting the gym?
The intensely muscular shooter is back!

name: Ever 17 Never 7 Double Pack
description: Stand up to the fate of infinity!

name: Star Wars: Prequel Pack
description: The STAR WARS: Prequel Pack offers four action-packed STAR WARS games for one low price!

name: The Ultimate Detective Bundle
description: Includes Cluedo: Classic Edition and Cluedo!

name: The SS Destiny Disaster
description: Humanity's ambition for the stars turns into a brutal fight for survival. The crew of The SS Destiny discovers a bacteria that turns their mission into a nightmare. Find resources, battle infected, and escape the doomed ship as it spirals into chaos.

name: Back in Service: A Metro Driver
description: Join the adventure and become the master of the Prague metro in our game, which takes you into the underground world of the capital city. Explore stations and overcome challenges on the tracks from the cabin of a historic train. Can you complete the route, transport all passengers, and avoid delays?

name: Chat is Real
description: A short horror game of a few minutes, with elements of combat and fear. You play as a streamer known as "Gargamelovo let's play šílenství" He always felt like an outsider, whether at school or at work. So he started talking to chat.

name: Dice Eater
description: Dice Eater is a mystery card game based around supernatural powers where players must use their power to uncover the other player's tricks. Use your opponent's tricks against them to turn the tables and win.

name: Lored
description: An idle game about collecting cancer with quirky stickfigures!

name: Squaser 3
description: Squaser 3 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Evaluate
description: This game provides players with a simple yet highly attractive stress relieving experience.

name: Fractious
description: This game plunges players into a challenging dungeon world where they play as a brave skeleton,

name: Tragedy at Ashville Lane
description: Dive into a psychological horror experience and try to uncover the mystery at Ashville Lane. Step into the shadows of your fears and face them to figure out what happened that day. Survival is your only option and remaining hidden is a must.

name: Idle Research 2
description: Idle Research 2 is an addictive, heavily-layered, incremental game themed around energy and resource management. It brings strategy, QOL, and feature synergism to the next level. The game takes place in 2070 on planet Mu Ra Tempel after the devasting Earth-27 Mutually Assured Destruction incident.

name: Musume
description:
The word "娘 (musume)" primarily means the following:

One's Daughter

A parent uses "musume" to refer to their female child.

Musume is a short dating game.

Get to know the daughter through her father, Itaru.

You can also flirt with her dad

Enjoy the game!

name: Conjunctivitalizer
description: Take on six stages of vertical shooting mayhem full of looney pixel art characters and locales. Gamers who are tired of bullet hell and Compile-like shooters can finally rejoice.

name: Vector Strike
description: Vector Strike is a fast-paced, physics based, non violent digital sport where mastery and teamwork are key to win. Shoot, double-jump, wall run, slide, dash, pass and score goals in intense matches where every decision counts. Pick your striker from a roster of powerful characters, each with unique abilities to master.

name: Lilac 0
description: The machine world of Molybdion has fallen into disarray. As Nidhogg eats the root of the planet, unending wars rage on the surface! Slice your way through hordes of metallic foes in five frantic levels, defeat fearsome bosses, and dodge countless bullets in this vintage vertical shoot 'em up.

name: Slime Attack: Survivor
description:
Slime Attack: Survivor is a roguelike action bullet heaven game where chaos reigns supreme! Dive into intense battles against waves of dynamic slimes and formidable bosses. Customize your character with unique gear and spells, and navigate through thrilling quests to unlock new content. With strategic resource management and heart-pounding action, every run is a new adventure.

Think you have what it takes to take on the slime invasion and become the ultimate survivor? Prove it!

name: My Make Believe Castle
description: An iconic environment and child-friendly, real time animation lets pre-readers, grades Pre-K to grade 2, bring to life a friendly dragon, princess, good and bad knights and horses as they play and learn in their own musical, castle play world. Children control the actions, mood and speech of a delightful cast of castle inhabitants. The near endless variations mean hours of ever-changing creative play. Each room of the castle features a fun, skill-building activity. Develops creativity, problem-solving, critical-thinking skills, sequential planning and memory.

name: In the Facade we Trust
description: You’re torn between a girl who obsessed with you and a creature. Whose words can lead you out of this endless and dangerous loop? Which "you" are you? Who is the real monster? Trust the right person in the right cycle to get closer to the exit, or be misled by facades, complicating your next loop.

name: Ropuka's Idle Island
description: A cozy idle game that sits anywhere on your desktop. Watch the frog cut grass, upgrade his tools, and decorate the island while you work or relax.

name: Fantasy Warlord
description:
Collect the souls of legendary Guardians ! Discover all 4 types of Guardians - Human, Demon, God, and Gaia. Combine your Guardians to create an even more powerful one.
Assemble your Guardians and battle the World Boss to climb up the rankings. Battle against other players around the world in Global PvP ! Build alliances with other players worldwide through the global chat. Avenge fallen allies and collect lucrative bounties.

name: Looking For Fael
description:
Upon receiving a cryptic voicemail from your missing roommate, the ordinary confines of your apartment transform into a surreal labyrinth. Guided by his voice and a custom retro console in hand, embark on a journey to decipher the mysteries that have twisted your home into an enigmatic maze.

But beware. The further you venture into other realities, the harder it will be to find your way back.

name: Mike Shadow: I Paid For It!
description: Mike shadow is an action and combat game, where a vending machine swallowed your money and you must fight it with dozens of special attacks with high animation quality. Collect money, upgrade your skills, use weapons, magic and other devastating powers to beat the machine.

name: Neptunian Nightmare
description: Neptunian Nightmare is a vanilla mapset and partial conversion for The Ultimate Doom (-complevel 3). It's an atmospheric romp heavily inspired by the Doom Bible and its associated prototypes, as well as Team TNT's TNT: Evilution and Icarus: Alien Vanguard.

name: Time For Tom
description:
Time For Tom is apparently the world’s first complete Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragons and the Blade of Light hack! This is a 18-chapter new story featuring a great number of improvements to bring the oldest backwards FE game up-to-date.

The Akaneian archer Thomas, and his buddy Jake, find a forgotten Time Orb which they plan to use to prevent the War of Darkness and stop Hardin from receiving the Dark Orb. Unfortunately, they have no idea how to use it! So, they travel through some other games in the series on the way… How will they right the wrongs of history?

name: Agoraphobia: Director's Cut
description:
A story of fear and doubts about reality, decisions and regrets, dreams and darkness.
~
A psychological horror adventure that takes the player through the wide corridors of a mysterious estate and confronts the protagonist with far-reaching decisions.
~
Find your own path, explore the sinister estate and uncover some of its deep-rooted secrets.
~
Leave this waking nightmare behind you, or slide further and further down into the rabbit hole of the Labyrinth of Agoraphobia.

name: 1-2-3 Bumblebee
description:
1-2-3 Bumblebee is a computer game designed to help toddlers learn how to use the mouse.
The Bumblebee behaves just like a "grown up" mouse pointer: Moving the mouse makes the Bumblebee fly, and clicking on squares will make colorful shapes appear.

The feedback is reinforced by multi-tone sounds and voice recordings. Once your child progresses through all three "pages", they are rewarded with a little song.

The game runs in fullscreen mode and the keyboard is locked to prevent your child from accidentally leaving the program.

name: Speedrun Academie
description:
In this first-person game, you’ll need to master every movement, optimize your trajectory, and maintain your momentum if you want to reach the finish. Every level is a challenge where slowing down isn’t an option, and mistakes aren’t forgiven.

Your mission is simple: start at point A, reach point B as fast as possible… but only a true speedrunner can shine.

name: Uncursed
description:
Uncursed is a co-op pirate adventure where you rescue lost souls, loot shiny treasures, items and uncover secrets so dark even your torch might quit. Survive deadly dungeons, face unpredictable weather, and the occasional chaos caused by your crewmates—all while gathering loot to buy a ship, buy cool gear, and maybe splurge on a new hat.

Your crew's goal is to buy and repair a ship to reach more distant waters and shed light on the threatening secret.

Explore the surrounding islands alone or in a team, collect valuable items and the souls attached to them. Every day you can take part in a new adventure in the procedurally generated dungeon, which rewards you with valuable treasures if you survive its terrifying creatures and cunning traps.

name: Everspace 2: Wrath of the Ancients
description: The Ancients have awakened! Their wrath has laid waste to human settlements in Cluster 34, and the path of destruction leads to the Okkar Homeworlds. Take flight in this massive expansion DLC as the Cluster readies for war once again in EVERSPACE 2: Wrath of the Ancients.

name: Underward
description: UNDERWARD is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Investigators must carry «TEST-SUBJECT» monsters from a deadly underground abandoned hospital ward.

name: Polish Simulator
description: In Polish reality, cunning and creativity matter—solve tasks in various ways, save time, and show your neighbor who's in charge. Hunt for deals, organize barbecues, and prove that a true Pole always finds a way to make life easier for themselves and harder for their neighbor.

name: Dying Light: 10th Anniversary Bundle
description: Released to celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Dying Light, this bundle includes the certified Hotshot Outfit, the invaluable Dawnbreaker shotgun, the radiant Sunburst revolver, and the glimmering Golden Idol machete. The gilded appearance of each item is a testament to everything you accomplished in Harran. This bundle also features the Golden Hour buggy paint job, symbolizing your role as a beacon of hope for survivors and a formidable force against enemies.

name: Grand Theft Auto III Toughened
description: Hard mod for the original GTA III.

name: Holy Wars: Sons of Enoch
description: Year - 5468 BC. 11 years have passed since the - supposed - defeat of the Golab demons. Under the protection of the angel Azaziel, the 'Holy Knights' order has been watching over the young Arrata kingdom, and over its king, Jonas. But have the Golabs really been eliminated?... It is now time for you to play the heroes of the comic book "Holy Wars" in this exciting fighting/magic/RPG game.

name: Forsaken Facilities
description: Find your fate in the Forsaken Facilities. Explore vast dungeons to gather a valuable resource for your mysterious kidnappers. Each day you enter a facility the only way to return is if you find the required resource. Test your luck to see how long you can survive through a variety of facilities.

name: Fox Legend
description: The gamescore is achieved separately, that is, for each version you will earn an exclusive gamescore.

name: Torii Guardian
description: Torii Guardian is a top-down tower defense action game where you need to defend the Torii gate to another world from hordes of evil spirits.

name: Stellar Strider
description: Sin descripción

name: FlipCat
description: FlipCat is a 2D platformer with a unique perspective rotation mechanic. Explore 30 challenging levels as a curious cat, overcoming obstacles, solving puzzles, and uncovering hidden paths in a vibrant pixel art world. Fun for all ages!

name: Quartz Caverns
description:
Quartz Caverns is an action-adventure puzzle game where you guide the main character through a series of ancient caves in search of mystical crystals. The caverns are filled with tricky puzzles, dangerous slimes, and other hazards that test your wits and reflexes. As you explore, you'll uncover hidden paths, discover powerful relics, and face numerous threats lurking in the shadows. Only the bravest can retrieve the legendary crystals and uncover the secrets of the Quartz Caverns.

Are you up for the challenge?

name: Factory Escape
description: Has work ever tried to kill you? Max is trapped in a deadly factory. Use your rolling skill, dodge traps, and find the key to escape!

name: Ballotron Galaxy
description:
Discover the newest challenge in your favorite arcade!
Blast off into space and put your skills to the test once again.
Shoot small balls to strike larger balls and blocks.
Uncover creative solutions to connect the blue and green ball.
Experiment with unique strategies to overcome challenging, logic-based puzzles.

name: Punch-Out!!: Shouhin-ban
description:
Also known by the unofficial titles of Punch-Out!! Gold and Punch-Out!! Special, with the in-game title of simply Punch-Out!!, recently released on the Japanese Nintendo Switch Online as Punch-Out!!: Shouhin-ban (Prize Version), this was the first released version of Punch-Out!! for the NES/Famicom, which was released in Japan, as a prize for the participants of the official NES Open Tournament Golf (Golf Tournament US Course) competition.

The main differences from the later versions is that the Dream Bout with Mike Tyson or Mr. Dream didn't exist yet, and Mr. Macho Man was the last opponent.

name: Boundland
description: Boundland is a fun physics-based platform game where you navigate your multi-shaped character through lots of dark levels and scary boss fights.

name: Ancient Ants Adventure
description: Your task is to become the leader of this great colony, rebuild your army and learn to use magic to protect your comrades in order to turn the tide of battle with terrible enemies.

name: Perfect Ninja Painter 3
description: New part of the puzzle platformer about ninja painters with new character, new features and new puzzles.

name: Pyramid Platformer: The Gem Heist
description: Explore the pyramid world in Pyramid Platformer, a challenging 2D pixel art game. Face 40 levels filled with traps like spikes and spinning saws. Unlock skills like Double Jump and Dash, and collect gems to advance on this thrilling journey full of challenges!

name: Take a Walk
description: Take a Walk brings nature trails to the comfort of wherever you are! This cozy, open-world walking simulator is the next best thing to touching grass. Embrace the calm, uncover hidden treasures and enjoy your walk.

name: Yosuga no Sora

description: Run, hide, adapt and survive in a mansion of endless night and bizarre brain-twisting phenomena in this 2D hand-drawn psychological horror title.

name: Popoposan
description: 'She' spoke 'something' and chased after me. Back then, running away was the only thing I was good at. At home and at school, I had no place where I belonged, and I always wanted someone to play with. "POPOPOSAN" is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: Supermarket
description: Run your own supermarket in this chaotic co-op/singleplayer simulator! Stock shelves, manage customers, and overcome quirky challenges in a lively, customizable store. Work solo or team up with friends for hilarious, fast-paced fun.

name: Wekele Wordle
description:
Worde, the addictive word-guessing game that challenges your vocabulary and deduction skills in just six attempts. Can you crack the code and find the hidden word?

Guess the daily word in 6 tries, practice with unlimited words or create your own Worde! Now with 5 levels: 4, 5, 6, 7 & 8 letter words!

description: Inside Intruder - is a psychological horror game that mostly focuses on atmosphere. Game takes place in your own home, where a uninvited guest comes in.

description: Escape from Irene is a psychological thriller where you wake up in a mysterious place, with no memory, under the watchful eye of Irene. Explore the house, uncover its secrets, and try to escape without alerting Irene—because if she catches on, something terrible will happen.

name: DotSec
description: DotSec is a modern hacking simulator where you can choose your path as a Black Hat, White Hat, or Gray Hat hacker. The choices you make will directly impact your journey through the hacking world while also guiding you through complex puzzles and challenges.

name: Electro Bop Boxing League
description: Climb the ranks and claim your spot among the greatest mechanical fighters in this Atompunk / Electro Swing themed auto-boxer! Outfit your boxer with a variety of parts, abilities, belts and crew upgrades earned through single matches or career mode!

name: Icarus: Climb to Olympus
description: Swing your hammer and spread your wings as you make the difficult climb to the top of Mount Olympus.

name: The Lost Island
description: A lonely warrior to find a plant, that has caused the extinction of the tribes.

name: Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate
description: Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life, but she decides enough is enough... She wants to change! And everything indeed changes when a spirit visits her and installs a strange app on her phone! The clock's ticking now... There are 90 days left!

name: The Backrooms: Forsaken
description: What would you do if you were trapped in a dimension of seemingly endless rooms that went on for eternity?

name: Street Li Fang Zhuan
description: Street Li Fang Zhuan is a Chinese micro horror game set in 1980s China, combining the story of understanding puzzles and text adventures. In the game, the scroll scene that can be moved by four axes is applied to bring different game experience to the player.

name: Gravity Storm: First Mission
description: Break the laws of physics, dash and shoot your way through levels full of hazards and machines gone rogue. In this retro game, you control Project Gravity Storm an advance machine able to control gravity itself; however, the mother computer will not make things easy for you.

name: Sprout Crafter
description: A farm simulation game where you cultivate nature, run a farm, and enjoy colorful interactions. Develop your farm by planting crops, harvesting, caring for animals, crafting, and exploring.

name: Elevator Music
description: You make the elevator go up, go down, go fast, and go slow. And yet, by the end of the week in an old hotel below looming Edelfaustian mountains, you'll have been the deciding factor in either war, or peace.

name: Steel Judgment
description: Steel Judgment is an ultra-fast roguelike movement FPS full of wacky combos and weapons that combines the expressive combat of beat-em' ups with the unhinged chaos of a roguelike. Wipe out hordes of enemies with a diverse moveset and arsenal while collecting powerful items with unique effects.

name: Final Redoubt: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Survive the onslaught, manage your ammo, and endure in Final Redoubt, a relentless survival shooter where every bullet, every swing, and every decision counts!

name: Can No One Hear Me?
description: All you have to do is press a key and speak into your microphone... But which key?

name: Slide to Solve
description: Slide to Solve is a minimalistic & relaxing puzzle game

name: Satan's Dungeon
description: First-person Philosophical Horror. Explore, solve puzzles, escape enemies, and uncover 5 unique endings.

name: Trashcan Simulator
description: The moment you throw something into the trash can is an exciting moment in your daily life. Through this game, you can enjoy the exciting moments of your life over and over again! You might discover something new by staring at the trash can in the room.

name: Galactic Simulator
description: Galactic Simulator is a clicker game based on the Fermi Paradox and the Great Filter theory. Players can simulate the evolution of celestial bodies and civilizations in the galaxy from an observer's perspective. The game supports multiplayer mode. Create a unique galaxy with friends!

name: Zombie Tide Incoming Final Defense
description: This is a refined third-person shooter game combined with tower defense elements.

name: Crashed
description: Crashed is a third-person stealth game where you play as B.O.B., stranded on the quirky planet SnamSam. The mission? Rebuild the craft and escape! You'll sneak through restricted areas and take daring routes. A splash of humour as B.O.B.'s detachable head knocks off the Snailmen's heads!

name: Max Manos
description: Max Manos is an incremental destruction game where you play as a powerful hand, known as Max Manos, eliminating shapes. Chain explosive reactions, collect shards, and upgrade your abilities to destroy shapes even faster.

name: Petal Crash 2
description: The freshest in arcade puzzle action blossoms again! Crash blocks together into dazzling chain reactions in a puzzle like no other - now completely refreshed with refined gameplay, arcade graphics, brand new game modes, and dazzling special attacks!

name: Dual Cat: Max
description: Join Max, the brave and clever cat, on a puzzle-platformer adventure to save his best friend, Erwin

name: Miiverse Clone RPG
description: Miiverse Clone RPG is a turn-based RPG based on Miiverse Clones, with a battle system similar to that of Undertale.

name: Vision Crew's Deltarune: Alternate Chapters
description:
Vision Crew's Deltarune: Alternate Chapters is a fangame project aiming to interpret Toby Fox's earlier concepts and Chapters, it's entirely speculative and plans to be worked on even once his own content is out!

It includes familiar characters, even ones Toby has namedropped without a design... or vice versa! But you'll also meet a ton of brand new characters!

name: Deltafall
description:
Deltafall is a Deltarune AU where the original trio discovers that their school was built after a science facility that conducts dangerous experiments with the dark world.

In 1977. A top secret corporation has found a way to harness the power of dark worlds to create any worlds they wanted. IDEATION INC has one goal. To create the perfect world. For all lifeforms. Not bound by reality. But bound by imagination.

name: Deltamon
description: Explore the vast region that Kris calls home as you aid them in becoming champion! Your rivals Susie, Noelle and Berdly join alongside you to see and catch over 200+ pokémon from Kanto to Paldea!

name: Deltarune: Hypothesis
description: A Deltarune fangame featuring a collection of hypothetical scenarios, each imagined as a fully playable segment of gameplay. Discover the hidden mysteries that connect these scenarios as you dive into each one, unraveling an existential truth about you and every adventure you’ve been on so far.

name: Undertale: Call of the Void - Placek's Take
description: Undertale: Call of the Void [Placek's Take] is an alternate interpretation of Undertale: Call of the Void, originally created by Saster and J-Bug. Developed by Placek and the COTW Team, this version introduces multiple unique endings, enhanced graphics, and fresh twists while preserving the signature Call of the Void style.

name: Abashed
description: Abashed is a 2.5D narrative-driven side-scrolling game that lets you explore the life of Issac, a man living with psychosis. One day waking up all alone, he sets out to find the truth behind his missing partner. On the way he finds himself needing to confront his deepest fears and the darkest secrets. Join Issac in this story of love, loss, fear, and acceptance. Reality is not what it seems.

name: F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu
description: F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu was compatible with the e-Reader, with some of its content depending of the cards to be unlocked. Later versions of the game had some of the content added as unlockables in other ways, but some of the data, like the stages and staff ghosts, weren't included.

name: Undertale Green: The Pre-Show
description: Experience a one-shot adventure setting up the vibrant characters of Undertale Green through a drab snippet of the surface! Interact with an unorthodox battle system, make new friends, and prepare for the long road ahead.

name: Fiefdom
description: Change the world, one battle at a time in FIEFDOM: a multiplayer action melee game set in a playerbase-driven story. Clash swords, cast spells, rain down arrows & more in in battles of up to 100 players both at land & at sea. Dive into a world where your victories define the outcome of entire wars. Who will you be fighting for?

name: Plane Destroyer
description: Plane Destroyer is an Infinite-Runner indie game where the galaxy is in trouble and you are the one to save it!

name: Grand Theft Auto Tightened Vice
description: GTA Tightened Vice is a sequel to the mod GTA III: Toughened, the goal of both mods is to make the game much more difficult.

name: Grand Theft Auto Tightened Thrice
description: 'Tightened Thrice' is a 'Tightened Vice' prequel mod for GTA 3, that seeks to make every single mission in the game harder, with a focus on ruining the muscle memory of speedrunners...

name: Vendrán las aves
description: You bought a guitar with your severance pay. And you have enough savings to do without a job for a year. So you've decided to devote some time to yourself.

name: The Land Before Time Animated MovieBook
description: The Land Before Time Animated MovieBook is an educational game for Windows-based PCs released by Sound Source Interactive in North America in 1996. The title contains full-motion video clips of the original Land Before Time (making it the Sound Source Interactive software adaptation of the first film in the film series), as well as puzzles and activities intended for players aged 3-6.

name: Your Android
description: Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.

name: F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu
description:
A complete version of F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu was released as part of the Nintendo Switch Online - Game Boy Advance library, exclusively in Japan. This new version includes all of the missing content that could only be unlocked using e-Reader cards on the original release.

This version wasn't released internationally.

name: The Land Before Time: Math Adventure
description: The Land Before Time: Math Adventure is an educational game for Windows-based PCs intended for children ages 4-8. It was released by Sound Source Interactive in North America in 1998. It contains a series of math-oriented minigames that, like The Land Before Time Activity Center, reward the player with "tree stars" and "dino bucks" that can be used to unlock video clips (once again). The game was mentioned in the book Gadgets, Games and Gizmos for Learning by Karl M. Kapp as an example of electronic learning that can allow up-and-coming students to develop problem-solving skills.

name: The Land Before Time: Preschool Adventure
description: The Land Before Time: Preschool Adventure is an educational game for Windows-based PCs intended for children ages 3-5. It was developed by WayForward Technologies and was originally released by Sound Source Interactive in North America in 1999. Designed for players to "have fun, develop their creativity, and learn about teamwork", the game features activities that contain story construction, musical games, and crafts. The game was re-released in October 2005 by Brighter Child.

name: The Land Before Time: Toddler Time
description: The Land Before Time: Toddler Time is an educational game for Windows-based PCs intended for children ages 2-4. It was released by Sound Source Interactive in North America in October 1999. It features a series of five minigames, each with three difficulty settings featuring characters from the series. In their review of the title, Discovery Educational declared that "we found the label of 'toddler' for this software to be somewhat of a misnomer. Most toddler software titles require very little mouse/keyboard skills and feature very basic concepts", saying that the game was more appropriate for players over 3 years old, and that "children in the upper end of the suggested age group will find a fair amount to do".

name: Plot Twist
description: Welcome to Plot Twist, where you take on the role of an ambitious writer in a world of stories and inspiration. You will manage your own writing career, create bestsellers, gain fans, and shape the history of literature! Your success depends on making the right decisions and your creativity!

name: Pokemon Emerald Imperium
description: A new Rom hack has all pokemon up to gen 9. Its a game made in the art and style of pokemon Emerald. New teams given to trainers, difficulty accross the board. Level caps are in the game. New mega pokemon.

name: The Land Before Time: Prehistoric Adventures
description: The Land Before Time: Prehistoric Adventure is a children's PC bundle game, based on The Land Before Time film series, released on October 1st, 2004. It contains the games The Land Before Time: Preschool Adventure and The Land Before Time: Kindergarten Adventure bundled onto three discs. The game was designed to "increase matching skills, reinforce alphabet, shape and number recognition" and was packaged with two accompanying card games.

name: Team Delusional's Dusttale
description: Team Delusional's Dusttale is our own take on the well-known AU: Dusttale, which in itself is a fangame of Toby Fox's Undertale. You will face many new roadblocks as the entirety of the underground questions your motives, and a familiar hooded figure looms over your every move. Will you choose the easy way out this time, or will you strive for a better tomorrow?

name: Undertale Plus
description: Undertale Plus is a mod that allows you to have your own completely customized Undertale experience! Bringing all-console exclusive content of the original, with widescreen support, colored sprites, custom battle backgrounds, bug fixes, and many more with add-ons.

name: Underswap: Echoed
description: “Underswap: Echoed” is the Breakfast Bunch’s reimagining of the popular Undertale AU, Underswap.

name: Desktoptale
description: Desktoptale is a tiny program that puts a fully controllable Undertale, Undertale Yellow or Deltarune character of your choice on your Windows desktop!

name: F-Zero 99: Ver. 1.5.0
description: This update added a new League, as well as new tracks based on BS F-Zero Grand Prix and unlockable decals based on machines from the Satellaview game.

name: Hungry in Dungeon
description: A bite-sized Game Boy eat-em-up made in GB Studio. Escape the Tomb of Eetemhup in a first-person dungeon crawler style, but with fast paced action combat. 7 short but difficult levels in total. Lots of mysterious creatures to eat.

name: Out of the Park Baseball 26
description: 26 years of sports gaming excellence! Out of the Park Baseball 26 is here - officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO! This year's brand new version puts you firmly in charge of your favorite baseball franchise. Your team, your way, your rules.

name: Dusttale Reimagined
description:
Ever wanted an Undertale fangame that completely re-builds (or rather, REIMAGINES) the concept of Dusttale from the ground up?
Well you're in luck! This game is just for you!
Explore the Underground, meet old friends in new situations and join us in this race for DETERMINATION against Flowey your best friend in Dusttale Reimagined!

name: Undertale Together: Next Soul
description: A mod of Undertale where you can play with two characters!

name: Depper Jar
description: Depper Jar is a turn-based RPG with fast QTE-based battles and different game modes inspired by Mario & Luigi and Undertale.

name: Deltaruined
description: Deltaruined is a mod of DELTARUNE, the Toby Fox's lastest game to the date. This mod includes both chapter 1 and 2. Enjoy Completely new battles! New Cutscenes! (original cutscenes reworked too!), new mechanics and a lot of unused content restored!

name: Sonic 3 & Tenna
description:
Eggman's off on vacation, Ring Racing, so Tenna came out of Eggman's TV and took everything while he was gone.

Blast through Sonic 3 with a Deltarune twist! With over 18 completely new bosses to fight, 6 new gameplay gimmicks to endure, and a modified story, Sonic 3 & Tenna completely transforms the game into a new, yet familiar experience! Not a Undertale, Deltarune or UTDR fan-content fan? That's okay! The bosses have been designed with Sonic gameplay philosophy in mind, and the entire experience itself is stand-out enough to not require any prior UTDR knowledge.

name: Underswap: The Reckoning
description: Out of all the possible paths you can possibly entwine yourself into, this one in particular will prove to really challenge your palette.

name: Backyard Boxing
description: Backyard Boxing" is a gritty urban boxing game where you fight to rise through an illegal league while hustling in the streets. Battle fierce opponents, gamble, race, deal, and travel to new cities, gaining fans and respect. Dominate the league and become a street legend!

name: The Upper Hand
description: Dive into the capitalist utopia of New Yolk and engage in the short story of Sockswald. Building up to the climactic fist-clenching bossfight against HANDROMEDA.

name: NightFell
description:
Trapped in a forgotten world atop an enchanted mountain, Monsters have been confined to an endless darkness. Life on the CROWN is dangerous and hopeless, with many monsters turning to cruelty to stay sane.

On Halloween night, Jackie accidentally stumbles into this terrifying realm. They're told the only way out is at the highest peak of the mountain. With that in mind, Jackie sets out to climb to the top with their best Friend, Flowey.

Will they forge friendships with the battle-worn residents that call this Hell a home? Or will they succumb to the ruthless law of this land... "Kill or Be Killed?"

name: Dusttrust X
description: From the developers behind the fangame Green Snas, Dusttrust X is a revitalization of the original Dusttrust AU as well as a spiritual successor to Legacy Underswap: Thanatos. You play as both Chara and Sans as you explore a broken version of the world you once knew and see how they both react to the new situation they put themselves in of their own doing.

name: Star Iliad
description:
Star Iliad is a Metroidvania adventure game set within this celestial leviathan - now in development!

Dive into the guts with Star Iliad, a retro-future action adventure game. Play as Blythe Braves, a star ranger stranded within the labyrinthine organs of the mythical Star Whale. Fight fearsome foes, sling spells and bullets, and befriend a charming set of castaways in your quest to escape.

name: Collect Baby Oil
description: Collect Baby Oil is a fast-paced runner where you have to run away from the police. Collect bottles of baby oil scattered along your path to unlock a variety of funny and unique characters such as Quandale Dingle. Avoid obstacles, time your jumps perfectly, and see how far you can go before the cops catch up.

name: Witch Stories
description: First-person retro horror RPG. Non-linear, open world, branching dialog, voice acted, simple controls, and tons of easter eggs to discover. Set in the 1700s. You are a woman living in a cottage in the forest with your husband and newborn baby. Your story unfolds over two days, whether you choose to act or not.

name: A Whole Wolfrush
description: Four friends battle their way across space to claim a once-in-a-lifetime wish. Their lives are in your hands.

name: Eve Online: Revelant
description: The Revenant expansion for EVE Online is live! Join forces with the Deathless and strike at the heart of darkness as you explore thrilling new opportunities, fearsome ships, powerful weapons, mercenary dens that harness new resources, and new ways to activate and unify your corporation.

name: Dim
description: Dim, a wandering soul whose light is constantly fading, must use the various abilities it possesses to traverse the dark and dangerous world surrounding it. Jumping through platforms and other dangers, the player must guide this lost soul through the darkness before its light runs out.

name: From The Past
description: What hides in the depths of the forest?!

name: WWE 2K25
description: Celebrate The Bloodline in Showcase. Compete online in MyGM. Expanded gameplay includes intergender wrestling, chain wrestling, barricade diving, the return of Promos + much more!

name: Hapunan
description: Sin descripción

name: Am I Nima
description: Am I Nima is a psychological-horror game where you must convince your mom that you really are her daughter. Combine words together in your brain and use them to talk. Get her to trust you.

name: Little Lighthouse of Horror
description: A pixel art psychological horror game inspired by the Flannan Isles mystery. Manage a remote lighthouse, handle limited resources, and confront eerie occurrences as isolation erodes your sanity. Multiple endings await based on your choices and actions. How long can you last?

name: Into the Zone
description:
Dominate the Goal Zone: Outlast your rivals and seize control to score. It’s not about kills—it’s about relentless control.
Engage in electrifying 1v1 duels, coordinate devastating team assaults, or unleash chaos in massive multi-team brawls! Every round is a wild, skill-testing party you won't want to miss. Easy to pick up, impossible to put down—this is a party game from another dimension!

description:
After 26 years, FATAL FURY is back!

The DELUXE EDITION contains:
• Base game, DLC costume (Fatal Fury 2: Terry)
• SteelBook
• Artbook (100+ pages)
• OST (2 discs)
• Sticker sheets (X2)
• Poster (double-sided)
• Collector's box

name: No Man's Sky: Worlds Part II
description:
Update 5.50, WORLDS PART II, transforms the universe with new stars, new story, and new planets. Explore ancient ruins, gas giants and water worlds, and discover strange creatures, varied biomes and dramatic terrain. Featuring new gameplay, huge improvements in lighting and water rendering, and much more.

Our journey continues.

Dive into the thrilling world of arcade-style soccer with [Your Game Name Here]! Experience the excitement of 4v4 matches, where every player counts. With 10 unique and fun teams to choose from, you’ll dribble, pass, and shoot your way to victory while defending your goal with a skilled goalkeeper.

Designed for fast-paced fun, this game focuses on easy-to-learn controls and engaging gameplay. Whether you’re sprinting down the field, setting up the perfect assist, or unleashing a powerful shot on goal, every moment is packed with action and excitement.

description:
-Your mission is clear: explore, survive, and escape.
Collect scattered keys hidden within the maze.
Outsmart a relentless creature stalking the maze, hunting you in the shadows.
Hide to survive, hide in the corner, and wait until it's out of your sight.
Find the exit and escape the nightmare before it’s too late.
Can you navigate the maze's twists and turns, or will you become a permanent part of its deadly legend?

description: Do you like playing platform games and especially the old ones? A brand new and yet old game (in appearance) in 16-bit cartoon graphics. Experience a crazy adventure with an unusual hero.

description: Monty the Mole's subterranean home had been damaged by the careless mining of uranium by the Noh-Kair Megacorp. His belongings have been scattered throughout the mines, and he needs to recover them before they are destroyed as well. You must lead Monty through the maze of elevator shafts to safety by avoiding the miners, bizarre creatures, radioactive walls and other shocking obstacles. Deactivate the radiation shields when necessary and navigate the teleportation system to retrieve belongings.

description: Nick Harrison, a new security guard at the Guadalupe Cemetery, believes he is taking on a peaceful night shift. However, as night falls, he soon discovers he was very wrong. Nick realizes the cemetery holds more than just the dead.

name: Sniper at Work
description: Sharpen your aim and embrace chaos in this action-packed single-player sniping experience. Scout targets, plan creative kills, and adapt when things go sideways. With dynamic missions, tactical freedom, and explosive surprises, every shot tells a story. Precision or mayhem - the choice is yours!

name: Hidden Cats: Spring Festival
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Spring Festival" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Projekt Godhand
description: An extremely high-speed "keyboard destruction rhythm game" in which any key on the same half of the keyboard can be used to input notes.

name: Mr. T-Shirt

description: Dino Crisis remastered to be fully playable on modern PCs by Capcom and GOG.

name: Puzzle Spy International
description: Pursue a ring of diamond thieves and their trail of cryptic puzzles in this ‘60s spy adventure. As Agent Epsilon you’ll choose your path as you chat with (or chat up!) suspicious contacts. Decode cryptograms, decipher clues and deduce answers as you solve wordplay & logic puzzles across the globe!

name: The LEGO Movie Video Game
description: The 3DS, Vita and Mobile versions of The LEGO Movie Video Game features utterly different level layouts and gameplay to the main version of the game, such as a system where you go back to the last checkpoint and losing progress when you respawn instead of respawning on the spot.

name: Dino Crisis 2
description: The legendary Dino Crisis 2 is back, fully playable on modern PCs.

name: DevTycoon
description: DevTycoon is a software development business simulation with a charming pixel art style, which challenges you to build and manage your own company in a world where competition is fierce and the challenges reflect real life.

name: Grandpa
description: Grandpa is a first-person horror game where players must escape from an old, abandoned house while being hunted by a terrifying old man. The game challenges players with puzzles, stealth mechanics, and limited resources as they navigate through a dark and eerie environment.

name: Tower of Babel Survivor of Chaos
description: Battle hordes of monsters, acquire new skills, and upgrade your abilities. Customize your build with hundreds of item combinations and reach the top to fulfill your deepest desires. Conquer the tower in this thrilling roguelite hack and slash survivors game!

name: Darth Vader Tamagotchi
description: The third Star Wars themed Tamagotchi.

name: Eve Online: Special Edition
description:
A collection of all ten free updates to EVE Online, up to early 2009's Apocrypha expansion.

The Special Edition includes:
- Exclusive digital Career Guide, roughly equivalent to a hint book (giving goals and suggestions for careers and playing the economy)
- 60 days of free game time, and a VIP code for 30 more days if a friend also subscribes. - Brand new accounts also receive an exclusive ship
- Certificate for instant access to the factional warfare system

name: Eve Online: Apocrypha
description: At Fanfest 2008 it was announced that instead of a six-month gap between expansions the subsequent expansion to Quantum Rise, Apocrypha, would be released on March 10, 2009. This expansion included a training queue, Tech 3 vessels, and exploration of uncharted space through unstable wormholes. Apocrypha has improved NPCs' artificial intelligence and has added a new NPC faction to the game, the Sleepers.

name: Hangman
description: The classic Hangman game is now on Steam! Help Balloon Boy guess the correct words and phrases to avoid being eaten by the beast.

name: Eve Online: Crucible
description: The Crucible expansion was introduced to refine the existing game aspects. New nebulae graphics, an improved UI, time dilation and gameplay balancing were included in the expansion. CCP also added a line of third tier battlecruisers, which can fit battleship weapons, and the remaining Captain's Quarters for the Amarr, Gallente, and Caldari races. In addition to this, the engine trail effect was reintroduced.

name: Eve Online: Dominion
description:
Dominion enhances the tools of communication and evolves the dynamics of war, altering the very way in which pilots interact with each other through warfare or cooperation. The vast riches of sovereign authority await for those bold enough to seize them amidst a beautiful, deadly universe of possibility.

The main focus of Dominion, the 11th expansion, is an overhaul in the alliance warfare sovereignty mechanics. It also includes the introduction of pirate epic arcs, an artistic redesign of planets and a social networking platform called COSMOS (previously called New Eden). Dominion updates the In Game Browser (IGB) with Awesomium (a browser toolkit based on Chromium), allowing the IGB to behave more like a true browser and properly render HTML, javascript and stylesheets.

This update includes:
- Sovereignty Evolves
- Sovereignty Infrastructure System
- New Doomsday Devices and Capital Ship Changes
- Improved Fleet Tools
- Exploration and Advanced PVP Tutorials
- Faction Ships Revisited
- Pirate Faction Epic Arc Missions
- Upgraded Planets and Starfields
- Improved In-Game Mail System
- Full Featured In-Game Browser

name: Zero Jikan he...
description: A gigantic meteorite will fall on the Earth in 3 days destroying it forever. At this time one amateur astronomer's photo of the comet tail initiated a series of full-scale riots and mayhem. How will you live three last days in such a world?

name: Eve Online: Incarna
description:
The overall Incarna feature revolves around allowing players to leave their pods and walk around in their station HQ. Currently 'face to face' interactions with other pilots is not possible. This feature has been in development for the majority of the life of Eve.

In the initial Incarna release all Captains Quarters were of Minmatar design. The captain's quarters are a private single player environment to introduce players to Incarna. As with the previous expansion (Incursion) this expansion will follow a segmented roll out. This allows for testing of each major feature under the stress of the live server separately.

Incarna also included a major visual revamp of all turrets, mining lasers, tractor beams and salvagers design and animation (including the firing animation).[48]

One of Incarna's changes, the introduction of the "Noble Exchange" (NeX) as an in-game market allowing players to buy vanity items, received negative reaction from players and prompted in-game riots.[49][50]

Other changes include:
- New design for the Maller hull, an Amarr cruiser size ship.
- Change of jumpbridge mechanics to a limit of one jumpbridge per system but in return a fuel bay increase to 30,000m3 from the original 10,000m3.

name: Eve Online: Incursion
description:
Incursion was announced on September 21, 2010. The expansion featured the "escalating attacks of the deadly Sansha's Nation". Players are able to join public fleets and co-operate to repel the Sansha incursions, receiving bounties and earning loyalty rewards. Incursion also includes many improvements as suggested by the CSM, as well as hardware upgrades, software improvements and new cluster components aimed at increasing game performance.

Additionally, the character creator was updated with CCP's Carbon character technology for new pilot portraits. Finally, CCP added a Sansha Mothership, the Revenant, Fighter-bombers, the Noctis salvaging vessel, improvements to NPCs and their AI, new loot and rewards, storyline events and a more dynamic and simplified system for Planetary Interaction. The web-based social networking platform, EVE Gate, and the official forums received updates in the Incursion expansion as well.

CCP released the Incursion expansion in three phases: a first-step patch with a collection of player-requested improvements on November 30, a second-step patch with hidden features before December 25, and a third-step patch that included key features of the expansion (Incarna Character Creator, Sansha Incursions) on January 18, 2011. CCP has stated that this method of implementation prevents a large number of bugs from infiltrating the code, and the key features "will benefit greatly from an additional level of polish."

During the second-step patch the learning skills were removed. Players were reimbursed in two ways, they got their invested skill points back which they then could redistribute to their liking or, when they hadn't already inserted the skillbook, they got the NPC price back.

name: Rebirth
description: Sin descripción

name: Eve Online: Inferno
description:
The 2012 summer expansion was announced with the name "Inferno" on February 22.Inferno brought a complete overhaul of the war declaration and factional warfare systems, addition of 17 new modules and 3D models for missile launchers and missiles along with a mercenary marketplace, unified inventory and graphical updates.

A list of the additions and modifications from the Inferno feature page:
- 3D models for missile launchers and missiles including animations, effects and sounds
- Graphics update including V3 textures for the majority of the Amarr fleet
- Overhaul of the war declaration system including the addition of war reports
- Update of kill mails to kill reports which add a graphical interface in addition to other features
- Mercenary marketplace for corporations and alliances to hire themselves out for mercenary jobs in a more official manner
- Factional warfare overhaul allowing players to spend LP points to upgrade empire systems along with a new UI interface
- Addition of 17 new modules in the categories of defense, offense and support which now make it possible for every fit to have a counter fit
- Additions to the character creator including new skin tones and a full resculpture for every character
- Unified inventory allowing players to see all the contents of containers they have access to at a station along with filtering and sorting
- Updated incursions which yield greater rewards for players than before
- Additions of an effects bar so players can easily tell what effects are being cast upon their ship
- More opportunities for players both rookie and veteran to earn income
- More UI enhancements to bring them into line with performance and aesthetic goals

name: Eve Online: Quantum Rise
description: The Quantum Rise expansion includes features such as a new certificate system that allows verification of a player's proficiency in certain defined groups of skills by other players and a medal system for awards by corporations. Industrial ships were rebalanced and optimized, with addition of the Orca-class ship, "a sub-capital logistical ship with a mining command focus." The staged delivery of the expansion began with the recent implementation of new technology such as StacklessIO and EVE64 which upgraded the server hardware and streamlined communication between server and client to reduce lag. These improvements provide performance allowing for player vs. player battles with thousands of participants. Further hardware and software improvements are planned. Other features of the expansion include further graphics updates as started in the Trinity expansion; the ability for players to group their vessels' weapons for easier interaction; changes to autopilot routes and avoidance of player-defined solar systems. This patch also brought a controversial overhaul of the speed system.

name: Eve Online: Retribution
description:
Retribution brought a revamped bounty system, a new "crimewatch" system, added 4 new destroyer ships and a new mining frigate, rebalanced the frigate, cruiser and destroyer ship roles and improved enemy AI.

A list of the additions and modifications from the Retribution feature page:
- A revamp of the bounty system, which deals out payment on financial loss
- A revamp of the criminal warning system, dubbed "crimewatch"
- A rebalance of ships in the frigate, cruiser and destroyer classes
- Addition of four new destroyers for each of the races with different attributes
- Addition of a new ORE mining frigate
- Improvements to the combat UI
- Improvements to NPC AI
- Addition of a new music audio system which works on location rather than a linear playlist. Removal of the jukebox
- Other minor features such as new items, the addition of a new safety system, a new salvage drone, and various performance improvements

name: Eve Online: Trinity
description: Features include an updated graphics engine and 5 new ship classes totaling 20 new ships. The 5 classes are interdictor cruisers (Heavy Interdictors) and electronic warfare frigates (Electronic Attack Ships) as well as battleships (Black Ops, designed for covert operations and Marauders, designed for long-range deployment) and freighters (Jump Freighters). Although "Factional Warfare," a major addition to game mechanics, had been planned for this patch it has since been announced that it will now be included in a future patch, along with Ambulation (walking in stations and Full Human Representation, announced on the Eve Online Fanfest 2007). Starting with the release of Trinity CCP offers two editions of the Eve Online client. One with regular graphics content, called Trinity 1.0 Classic, and one with updated graphics, called Trinity 1.0, also referred to as Premium. Players who run a Shader Model 3-capable graphics card can choose whether they want the Classic or Premium content. Without such a graphics card the client uses the Classic content.

name: Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App
description:
FMV (Interactive Movie)

"It's not that I can't date; I just won't date just anyone!"
Meet Tesu Kang, a simp who's never had a girlfriend in his 30 years. Now facing the harsh reality of aging without any prospects for romance. he realizes that if there's no path, he must forge his own. Determined to find new love through a dating app, Tesu embarks on what could be the biggest challenge of his life.

Join in and see how your choices will change his destiny!

name: Monochrome Nemesis
description:
Dive into the Darkness!

Enter the captivating universe of Monochrome Nemesis, a die and retry game in black and white pixel art, offering a retro black and white experience. Relentlessly face a formidable knight who gains strength and strategy with each duel. Each victory makes your Nemesis more powerful, ensuring a constant and renewed challenge.

For Challenge Seekers, Monochrome Nemesis is designed for those who seek a true challenge. Each combat demands skill and perseverance, putting your abilities to the test.

A Game Without Limits, Except Yours. Monochrome Nemesis is a record game, with no mechanical limits other than your own endurance. How far will you go to defeat your Nemesis?

Prepare to take on the ultimate challenge and prove your worth against your Nemesis.

Created with Godot by an Independent Developer.

name: Eve Online: Tyrannis
description: Tyrannis expands the universe of EVE Online in ways never before imaginable. Within New Eden, pilots will now be able to descend on planets, construct colonies and harvest their hidden treasures. Beyond New Eden lies EVE Gate, a central portal for the EVE community to interact, organize and communicate even when they are not in game. Tyrannis introduces new platforms and new technology, setting the stage for even bigger things to come.

name: Super Clew Land
description:
Eat, evolve, and explore in this happy-go-lucky exploration-based platformer.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Morsomnia:0
description: Interacting with the unidentified life form “Kuon”, we move forward with the pain. A surreal, mysterious fancy adventure.

name: Iridescence
description: Explore a serene island where land and sea intertwine on your quest to help a mysterious girl from the sea find her way home. Uncover rich mythology and hidden truths in this heart-warming, epic tale, brought to life with gorgeous artwork and music. Embark on a truly unforgettable adventure!

name: The Bench
description: Relax on a park bench, find hidden objects, solve quirky puzzles, and fend off pesky pigeons in this charming, interactive adventure. Enjoy beautifully stylized, colorful levels keeping you entertained!

name: Starling
description: Starling is a student made third person base-building exploration game. As an employee of Starling Corp., your mission is to gather resources from across the galaxy. After an unexpected turn of events, you will need to rebuild your base while being assisted by adorable creatures known as starlings.
