name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate - Casey Jones & the Junkyard Jam
description: Casey Jones joins the fight in this fast-paced, action-packed DLC! Battle through the Junkyard, face new enemies and bosses, and collect new powerful artifacts. Master Casey's hard-hitting moves and team up with the Turtles in co-op to take on the Punk Frogs!

name: Cotton Reboot! High Tension!
description: Sequel to Cotton Reboot!

name: The Treehouse
description:
One of the best edutainment titles ever made for pre-shoolers (aged 5-8), The Treehouse was designed to prepare First and Second graders to develop a positive experience toward learning, as well as impart knowledge on basic subjects they are learning in schools.

Kids will enjoy discovering many mini-games and and activities that are cleverly presented as objects in the treehouse. The games cover a wide range of subjects. In one game, for example, kids will learn new words, arrange them in sentences, and see them performed by eccentric bug actors. In another, they will practice elementary math skills and identify coins to outwit pirates. They will learn about the animal kingdom and watch over ninety animals animate as they are placed in different natural backgrounds. Afterwards, kids can show off their natural science knowledge in a fun game show, WhatUs My Animal!

In addition to mini-games, The Treehouse also features many activity centers that are there just for fun. In the Music Studio, kids can explore their musical talents as they compose songs using a variety of instruments and styles. In the theatre, they can create a play by mixing and matching a range of characters, objects, and scenery, as well as write their own movie script.

With a staggering range of activities, games, and cute animations, The Treehouse will keep preschoolers enthralled for hours on end without realizing that they're learning useful skills along the way. It is no wonder that the program went on to become one of the best selling programs from Brøderbund, and went on to inspire many sequels and CD-ROM remakes. Two thumbs up!

name: MLB The Show 25
description: Forge your baseball journey in The Show

name: Winter Hubris
description: A point-and-click horror game where you must survive in an isolated base as you wait for rescue.

name: 10 Seconds
description: Time loop puzzle horror, where you're stuck in a failed experiment and must escape or face being eaten for eternity.

name: Apple Orchard Escape
description: Overview: Run around an apple orchard as Val, she is the pumpkin headed mascot of a rival pumpkin patch to the apple orchard that she finds herself at. Don't make too much noise or you'll be caught!

name: The Closing Shift
description: An interactive first-person horror game. Walk, look around, and talk to people to finish the short story about closing your restaurant. Complete the story with immersive sounds, and spooky tension and jumpscares to keep you focused.

name: Somnus
description: SOMNUS is a first-person indie game in the genre of adventure with elements of horror. The protagonist, a young boy, faces a difficult ordeal: his mother is seriously ill, and in order to pay for her treatment, he takes a job as a night guard.

name: The End of Infinity Return
description: The End of Infinite Return is a story that unravels the fate and secrets of the secret agent Lexy as she goes on missions in a simulated world.Use a variety of firearms to defeat enemies and solve puzzles while deciding your own fate.

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2 HD
description: A young girl confronts eerie manifestations and deciphers cryptic puzzles as she sets out to defeat three cursed toys and rescue her friends.

name: Memento Mori
description: It's a VR-style room escape game that immerses the mystery and horror atmosphere, acquiring items and performing gimmicks and quizzes to escape this place..

name: Before Arthur
description:
Lead your people through the dark ages in this blend of medieval grand strategy and RPG simulation. Rule your kingdom while navigating the life of a monarch; battling the elements, religious strife, disease, and political treachery. Will you survive as a Briton, or conquer as a Saxon?

Set in the dark ages during the Saxon invasion of Britain, you choose your faction and design your first character who will forge your dynasty. As you go about living your character's daily life you will be building and managing your small kingdom, deciding where to place buildings, what laws to pass and who's other kingdoms to invade.

name: Articrafty
description: What will you create? Combine realism and fantasy. Combine characteristics with abilities. Create unique items. Achieve "Legendary" mastery. Breathe life.

name: Eve Online: Castor
description:
Castor was the first major content addition. It focused on refining current functions along with adding "Tech 2" elite components and ships. With its release, Eve players saw conquerable stations in 0.0 (deep space) security systems, the introduction of the agent mission running system, the introduction of research agents, and many other features released between the launch of Castor and its follower, Exodus.

This update includes:
- Tech Level 2
- Player Owned Conquerable Stations
- New Ship Classes
- New Agent Features
- Market Changes
- Updated Ship Technology
- Crime Fighting
- Advanced Skills
- Weapon Upgrades
- Auto-cloak

name: Is This Seat Taken?
description: Is This Seat Taken? is a logic puzzle game where you play matchmaker for groups of hilariously particular people. Each character has pet peeves that make seating them a delightful challenge. Find the perfect spot for each person to unlock new levels in this cozy, silly, and relatable experience.

name: Eve Online: Exodus
description:
Exodus is considered by the developers to be the first major game expansion. The expansion added multi-level "deadspace" scenarios, new environments and ships, better handling of conflicts, additional market functionality, user interface improvements, and an updated in-game web browser. A formalized method for alliances between corporations and the ability to claim sovereignty of a solar system via new "player owned starbases" was also added. Prior to its official release, this expansion was codenamed "Shiva."

This update includes:
- New Ships
- Starbases
- New Helper Applications
- New Multi-level Scenarios
- System Scanning
- Mining Improvements
- Corporation Improvements
- Alliance Systems
- War Declaration
- User Interface Improvement
- New Agent Functionality
- New Aggression System
- New NPC Types
- Market Improvements
- Fleet Command and Tactical View
- Updated In-game Browser

name: Eve Online: Cold War
description:
Cold War Edition contained an extensive new tutorial sequence and a storyline background introduction. Challenging "level 4" agent missions were added for experienced players, as well as "COSMOS" constellations where in-space agents began giving out story-driven missions and unique rewards. The freighter and dreadnaught capital ships, full-fledged player-owned "outposts," and improved NPC pirate factions brought deep space play to a new level. This expansion also added Unicode chat support, allowing communication in Asian, Cyrillic, and Greek languages.

This update includes:
- Combat Improvements
- Outposts
- Pirate Factions Upgrades
- New World Order
- Cosmos Constellations
- Dreadnoughts
- Encounters In Space
- Leadership Overhaul
- Freighters
- Mini-professions
- New Complexes
- Convoy Raiding Lucrative
- System Sovereignty
- Unicode Chat & Client Improvements
- Research Breakthroughs & Skills

name: Eve Online: Red Moon Rising
description:
Red Moon Rising was split off from the "Kali" expansion in order to maintain a more regular patch schedule. It included many performance optimizations and updates to combat, research, and manufacturing gameplay. Unicode support was also expanded from the chat system to game-wide. A major focus of the expansion was revamping existing ships and adding many additional ship classes. Twenty-three new Tech 2 ships were added including Exhumers, Force Recon cruisers, Command Ships, Interdictors, and most notably, the capital ships Carrier, Mothership, and Titan.

This update includes:
- Carriers & Motherships
- Titans
- Bloodlines
- Starbases And Sovereignty
- Tech 2 Ships
- Project Rebirth
- Cosmos Constellations
- Next-gen Manufacturing & Research Facilities
- Optimizations
- Fighters
- Combat Revisited
- Drones Revisited
- Needful Things For Mining
- NPCs Revisited
- Eye For An Eye
- Tech 2 Ammunition
- Unicode Client
- New Corp Logos
- Jettison Canister Flagging
- UI Improvements
- Tractor Beam

name: Great Deceiver
description: A visual novel about what happens when a modern-day empress meets an ordinary man.

name: Eve Online: Revelations II
description:
Revelations II is the second of three expansions, designed to show the increased tensions between the empires within the game universe. Several new features were introduced; including a mechanism for overloading modules and area of effect bombs. A number of existing features have been extended including Level 5 agents, changes to sovereignty, starbases outposts, and balancing changes to the Amarr race. Revelations II also changed the way new players start the game, in addition to new optional tutorials the existing tutorial has been shortened and refined, and players now start in a private dungeon to allow new players to get used to the controls in a protective environment.

This update includes:
- Heat
- Anti-Fleet Warfare
- Structure Warfare Enhancements
- Starbase Warfare
- Outpost Warfare
- Outpost Upgrades
- Expanding the Frontiers of Exploration
- Agent Mission Improvements
- Broader Sovereignty Scope
- Improved Corporation & Alliance Management
- Need for Speed
- Immersive New Player Experience
- General Improvements

name: Farming Simulator VR
description: In a relaxing hands-on experience, Farming Simulator VR brings you closer to the soil: Cultivate your fields with yielding crops like corn, wheat & soy. Operate authentic agricultural machinery by renowned manufacturers, directly in the cabin of powerful tractors. Grab repair tools to maintain your vehicles and their parts in the workshop. Tend to vegetables in the greenhouse, and don’t forget to keep your machines sparkling-clean with the pleasure of power-washing!

name: Eve Online: Empyrean Age
description:
Empyrean Age, previously named Kali 4, is the name of the 8th expansion of Eve Online and the last one in the Kali tetralogy. CCP has included Factional Warfare in this release. In this expansion the in-game story plays a key role and the situation in the game reflects events depicted in the novel of the same title by Tony Gonzales. The expansion allows both individual players and whole corporations to fight for certain NPC factions and battle for control of certain regions of space. Agents provide missions and objectives which alter player and corporation standings with the factions accordingly.

This update includes:
- Factional Militias
- Ranks
- Factional Warfare Agents
- Statistics
- System Occupancy
- Combat Zones
- Factional Warfare Complexes
- World Shaping

name: Skufs vs. Quadrobers
description: This isn't what our grandfathers fought for! Rise from your soulful, old apartment and resist the Western heathens – the Quadrobers, who are trying to impose their rules! Or, join the modern Quadrobers and show the Skufs that the era of sweaty, beer-bellied men is over!

name: Dragon Realms
description: Be the dragon! Customise, upgrade, and dominate a vast fantasy world. Destroy castles, battle foes, gather treasure, and rule Dragon Realms!

name: Worm Girlfriend Dating Simulator
description: A short visual novel with physics-based movement about waking up as a worm and finding love.

name: Kanken Smart Taisaku
description: Switch iteration of the Kanken kanji study series of games, made for study for the Kanji Kentei test.

name: Eve Online: Odyssey
description:
Dominion represents the type of conquest never realized by pretty words and poetry. It is true power born from the broken hulls of a thousand starships, the genes of the ambitious and the hubris of the greedy. EVE's 12th free expansion offers the power of control to anyone bold enough to seize it, bringing you the tools for you to rally legions together and carve out your own space.

Will your ambitious new Alliance rise up to the challenge and stake their claim, evolving territory to suit it's needs? Will your established empire hold fast against the fleets that press at your borders, hungry for the wealth you protect? Will you call old friends to your side and convince them to join you once more in battle? Or are you the clever entrepreneur who sits clear of the danger and fuels the war from the periphery?

Dominion enhances the tools of communication and evolves the dynamics of war, altering the very way in which pilots interact with each other through warfare or cooperation. The vast riches of sovereign authority await for those bold enough to seize them amidst a beautiful, deadly universe of possibility.

name: Eve Online: Rubicon
description: Rubicon brought major updates and changes to core game elements, the certificates system was overhauled along with the player login screen. New features included the addition of player owned high-sec customs offices, ghost sites, new hacking mechanics, Twitch streaming. The update is also the first steps towards colonisation, as stated in CCP Seagull's vision.

name: Eve Online: Citadel
description:
This update includes:
- Added citadels: Astrahus, Fortizar and Keepstar
- Added special Palatine Keepstar
- Alterations of structure assault mechanics - dev blog
- Added asset safety
- Added Access Lists for citadel control
- Added Force Auxiliaries: Apostle, Minokawa, Lif and Ninazu
- Reworking of capital ships
- Visual effects alterations for combat feedback
- New faction NPC capital ships
- New capital ship weapons
- Visual effect alterations for station hangars
- New structure fitting window
- New superweapons for capital ships

name: Eve Online: Ascension
description:
This update includes:
- Added Alpha and Omega Clone States - dev blog
- Added Engineering Complexes - dev blog
- Added complete new player experience Inception - dev blog
- Added Command Bursts - dev blog
- Alterations to fleet boosts
- Added fitting simulator
- Rebalance of Tactical Destroyers
- New effect generator for Titans
- New visual feedback from command bursts, combat logs and effects bar
- Visual and audio effects update to explosions and wrecks
- Rebalance of Rorqual
- Added Pulse Activated Nexus Invulnerability Core (PANIC)
- Rehaul of character sheet - dev blog
- Added NPC Mining Operations

name: Eve Online: Onslaught
description:
New Eden is in an ever-evolving state and as we push toward the third decade, the next expansion for EVE Online is right on the horizon.

More quality of life changes, fresh balance, new precursor ships and content and more iteration on abyssal deadspace are right around the corner with EVE Online: Onslaught, as well as a whole host of new navigation structures that further enable capsuleers to become masters of their domain.

This update includes:
- Added frigate trio Abyssal Deadspace and Abyssal PvP (dev blog)
- New Triglavian Destroyer (Kikimora) and Battlecruiser (Drekavac)
- New Activity Tracker (dev blog)
- Buffs to ECM strength and to Powergrid, CPU, and signature radius for many ECM-bonused ships (CCP forum post)
- Force Auxiliary and some capital tanking modules nerfed (CCP forum post)
- New Upwell FLEX Structures for player-owned jump gates, cyno inhibitors, and cyno beacons, replacing older equivalents

name: Eve Online: Zenith - Quadrant 3
description:
This update includes:
- Armor hardener module tiericide
- Triglavian Invasion Chapter 3: EDENCOM Prepares for Triglavian Invasion and EVE PULSE - Invasion Ch.3, Graphical Update, CSM15
- A special 17th Birthday Celebration version of Capsuleer Day

name: Eve Online: Eclipse - Quadrant 2
description:
This update includes:
- Associated Event / Lore Update: Black Friday Boosts: Skill Points, Boosts, tax reduction. Invasion Chapter 2
- New Triglavian Dreadnaught Zirnitra
- New system for bookmarks with comfort features (easy sharing, ...)
- Updates to Micro Jump Field Generators, Bosonic Field Generators, and Support Fighters
- Stabber Fleet Issue and Tempest Fleet Issue have now and extra damage bonuses to rate of fire
- Medium Autocannons are improved (rate of fire, range, fallof)
- New Player Experience now has a login campaign with minor rewards.

name: Eve Online: Gateway
description:
The update includes:
- Secure Key Storage sites balance
- AIR New Player Experience launched
- Increased availability of Ice Belt locations, increased respawn time
- Mercoxit in asteroid belts increased by 200%
- Mercoxit anomalies spawn rate increased by 200%
- Mykoserocin gas site spawn chance reduced by 60%
- Introduction of Skill Plans, and Skill Catalogue features
- Skill training queue limit increased to 150 skills
- 24 hour limit removed from Alpha Training Queue
- Personal deployables barred from new player starting systems

name: Bloodpath
description: An intense and challenging shooter with slow mo and lots of blood, inspired mainly by SUPERHOT and Hotline Miami

name: Eve Online: Reign
description:
This update includes:
- Fleet Finder tool to better find available fleets
- 50% DPS increase to Marauders' Bastion Module
- Removed cost to set Home Station which can now be set without Clone Bay Service

name: Eve Online: New Dawn
description:
This update includes:
- Added AEGIS Secure Transfer Facility, AEGIS Secure Capital Construction Forge, AEGIS Capital Ship Security Facility, and Overmind Nursery Groves sites
- ESS activation causing Capsuleer Combat Timer replaced with Weapons Timer instead
- Drag and Drop ship fittings to skill plan
- Increased Rogue Drone NPC buy orders
- Corporation Recruitment changes

name: Eve Online: Havoc
description:
This update includes:
- Added new content: enlist with Angel Cartel and Guristas Pirates in Faction Warfare
- Added new content: Deathless HQ station & Zarzakh system
- Added new content: Pirate Insurgencies
- New ships: Mekubal; Mamba; Khizriel; Alligator; Azariel
- Altered ship industry requirements:
-- Titans: Vanquisher; Komodo; Molok
- Updated content: AIR New Player Experience
- and more

name: Eve Online: Equinox
description:
The rejuvenation of nullsec has begun! New Upwell structures are now available to corporation and alliance leaders, to shape sovereign space in their image, and pilots can fly new defense-capable industrial ships into a new era. Creative capsuleers are empowered to design personalized ship SKINs for themselves or their organization and tackle new and improved goals and Corp Projects. In addition, the biggest update to EVE Vanguard since December is coming in the Solstice event, introducing a new map, weapon modifications, and more.

This update includes:
- New feature: SKINR Ship Personalisation (custom ship SKINs)
- New structures: Orbital Skyhook, Sovereignty Hub, Metenox Moon Drill
- Major changes to Nullsec Sovereignty, iHubs and TCUs
- New Upwell Haulers: Squall, Torrent, Deluge, Avalanche
- Carrier balance reworks with new modules: Capital MJD, Capital MJFG
-- New carrier-based Faction fighters
- Daily Logins replaced by Opportunities/Daily Goals
And more

name: The Black Lamb
description: The Black Lamb is a folklore horror game inspired by eerie childhood tales and real-life events. After a tragic accident, you find yourself drawn to a mysterious black lamb. Following it leads you to an unsettling village—but this is no ordinary village. Dark secrets lurk within, and your only choice is to uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors around you.

name: Star Crew
description: Star Crew is a 1-8 player co-op sci-fi roguelite. Maintain subsystems, fend off enemies, and stay alive long enough for evac to arrive. Powerful upgrade choices, procedurally-generated ships, and permanent progression. Survive with friends or handle things all by yourself.

name: UDAA
description: Sin descripción

name: Undertale: Icebound
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Chaos Revolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Deltarune: Broken Destiny
description:
Deltarune: Broken Destiny is a tale set in the original Deltarune universe.
We see a new part of Deltarune's world away from Hometown.

name: Mitsuge! Megami-sama
description: "Ogiri Adventure Game" is a quest to gather and donate items to please the Goddess. Find theme-based items highlighted in red, donate within the budget, and raise the emotion meter. A high meter brings joy, while a low one may cause anger. Keep trying!

name: The Sims: Legacy Collection
description: The original game you know and love. For Windows 10/11. Create a neighborhood of Sims and guide their lives through careers and romance — or create chaos with open-ended gameplay that lets you shape their destinies.

name: The Sims 2: Legacy Collection
description: The game you know and love. For Windows 10/11. In The Sims 2, you direct your Sims over a lifetime. Give them a long existence or leave their lives in shambles. Guide their characteristics from one generation to the next.

name: Jumpers League
description: A competitive online multiplayer platformer where every jump is a gamble. Climb to the top while using strategic abilities to outsmart your opponents, but beware: one misstep can cost you all your progress.

name: Supercar Collection Simulator
description: Supercar Collection Simulator is a game where you sell surprise car boxes to earn money, build a car collection and engage in exciting races with rivals.

name: Hoover Heroes
description: Hoover Heroes is a physics-based multiplayer party game for up to 8 players to play online, featuring cute and silly cleaners. Funny animations, colorful graphics, and fun mechanics will keep you laughing every moment.

name: Withering Realms
description: A ghost and her doll guardian explore the mysterious town of Penwyll and the sprawling graveyards, tombs, caves and rotting estates that surround it in this Horror Action RPG from the creator of Withering Rooms.

name: Froggy Drink Bar!
description:
The Froggy Drink Bar is open! Help coco the frog keep things running!

Mix colors to create drinks and keep clients happy. Good luck!

name: Trail of Stars
description: Trail of Stars is a short, bittersweet fairy-tale about two vulnerable souls navigating first love, growing up, and protecting what they have—when all they have is each other.

name: Eighth Era
description: The first game of its kind, rewarding competitive players with real-life collectibles. Embark on an epic journey 10,000 years in the future in Eighth Era! Join The Collector’s Society, battle digital monsters, and uncover powerful relics as you restore life to a world on the brink of collapse. With collectible coins and thrilling challenges, every victory brings you closer to a real-world reward. Dive into the adventure and experience a turn-based RPG like no other—where your virtual journey has real-world consequences!

name: Isadora's Edge
description: Can you keep going when all hope is lost? Isadora's Edge is a 2D Action Platformer with a unique future fantasy setting. Explore an alien world, battle against the corrupted forces bringing it to the edge of destruction, and uncover the secrets behind its impending demise!

name: Whisperstring
description: Whisperstring is an 80s inspired text adventure game that takes place inside a “chat room”. You’re connected to Adam, a "jock" with a severe fear of strings, who seems to have been the victim of a supernatural kidnapping. Will you be able to help him escape?

name: The Way To Life
description: The Way To Life is a short, but meditative experience. Leave the world behind as you enter the desert, meeting monks, learning about their struggles, and gaining wisdom along the way.

name: Zaleste
description: Shmup collaboration between Compile Heart and M2.

name: SkullSP
description: SkullSP is a PVP survival video game, base building and base raiding,.

name: Beyond Blue: After the Storm
description: After a severe tropical storm damages an underwater research station, Mirai and her crew are asked to help repair the damage and lend aid to the creatures in the surrounding biosphere. What they uncover there is more dangerous than they could have realized and will take all their skills, and help from an unexpected ally, to make right.

name: Tamashika
description:
The game is about keeping your mind at one place.

Patterns in sensate experience reinforce an illusion of continuity. The dream is a construction of the mind that perpetuates the illusion.

The cartesian prison is a hall of mirrors, a recursive labyrinth. Each a reflection of me—only patterns and processes.

The present moment is the only thing that is real—focus. Chaotic attractors are seizing your attention. Don’t push or pull at it.

You have to reduce model complexity, you must cultivate flow. The game is about keeping your mind at one place!

Concentrate… and remember… Attention is all you need.

name: Yaku Slap
description: Yaku Slap – A rogue-like card battler where you duel monsters, master Hanafuda combos, and slap down the perfect hand! Unlock new perks, and classes as you fight your way down the Flower Path to become a Yaku Master!

name: X-Mode
description: Free-to-play action packed multiplayer FPS featuring a variety of gamemodes. Perfect for quick casual games with friends.

name: Tatoe Sore ga Unmei de Atte mo
description: Miyako, an alpha, has a happy relationship with her childhood friend and boyfriend Toto, a beta. But when Utsuro, an omega, transfers to their school, Miyako realizes that he's her fated mate.

name: Ciphoid 9
description:
Ciphoid 9 has been designed to exploit the graphic capabilities of the Commodore 64 to the full. All scenes are in hi-resolution multi-colour graphics and particular attention has been paid to perspective and visual effects to make ciphoid 9 the most realistic 3-dimensional space game yet.
You will see the hi-res screens scrolling to show different sectors of the lunar base. The alien fighters execute complicated flight paths as they try to evade your phaser bolts. You will see the ships phasers and nuclear shells get larger, as they hurtle towards you, just as they would in real life.

name: The Tower Of The Gods
description:
In The Tower Of The Gods, embark on a legendary mission to ascend a towering, mystical fortress. Each level of the tower is guarded by a formidable boss, an ancient deity, or a mythical creature, each with unique abilities and lethal strategies. With no minor enemies to slow you down, every battle is a titanic showdown that will test your skill and courage.

With every victory, you climb closer to the summit, where your destiny as a legendary hero awaits. The tower challenges not only your combat prowess but also your ability to unravel the mysteries and secrets of the gods. Will you overcome all the challenges and claim your place among the legends?

name: Make Up Human
description:
Make up a person by combining body parts!

"Make Up Human" is a 3D puzzle game.
Drop human body parts such as eyes and ears into a box.

When the same parts come into contact with each other, they will change into the next level part.

Parts will age over time and will never be able to change again.
Be careful, as in rare cases they may not age and become cancerous!

If you're lucky, you might find a special part that can change any part.

If even one part falls outside the box, it's game over.

name: Dead Lamb Walking
description:
You are alone and vulnerable. Beware of the big bad wolf.

A short, free, thriller-suspense interactive fiction made in RPG Maker.

name: Puss The Way Id Did
description: PUSS The Way Id Did﻿ is a set of 62 Limit Removing speedmaps inspired by the original!

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Fox
description:
THUNDER FOX is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Become a member of the "THUNDER FOX" anti-terrorism team and join the fight against the terrorists.
Complete varied missions using flying kicks, somersault attacks, and multiple unique vehicles such as gyrocopters, jet skis and more!

name: Roulette Dungeon
description: Roulette Dungeon is a turn-based rogue-like where you spin a roulette wheel to defeat your enemies. Master the balance between strategic planning and unpredictable luck by placing bets, using special abilities, and collecting items to outsmart your foes and conquer the dungeon.

name: Seitokai no Ichizon: DS Suru Seitokai
description: You take control of Sugisaki Ken, the sole male member of Hekiyou Academy's student council. Your mission is to make the rest of the student council members his harem by Christmas Day by improving popularity for nine months from April to December.

name: Pony Kart DS
description: Pony Kart DS is a mod of Mario Kart DS that contains 12 custom characters (each with 1 custom kart), 16 custom tracks (replacing the retro tracks from Mario Kart DS) and has most items edited to fit in more with MLP.

name: Guilty as Sock!
description: Enter a chaotic courtroom where socks play lawyers, prosecutors, and judges! Use absurd evidence, craft wild arguments, and deliver verdicts in this hilarious online party game. Improvise, strategize, and shout "Objection!"—because in Guilty as Sock!, chaos always wins!

name: Vampires in your area
description: Single vampires nearby are waiting to chat with you!

name: Stains of Regret
description: Stains of Regret is a short 2D horror experience following the story of a father looking for his daughter. Follow his journey learning more about the world and its characters as you attempt to find your daughter, all whilst having to face unspeakable horrors and personal demons.

name: Auto-Crisis
description: You're driving away on a forest road, late at night, under a heavy storm. Your car breaks down. Luckily, there might be a gas station nearby. But a misfortune never comes alone. The storm has brought something else, something otherworldly that oddly smells of spilled diesel oil.

name: Demiurgos
description: Demiurgos is a competitive strategy god game where you wield divine powers to convert followers, outmaneuver rival deities, and reshape the world. Choose Good or Evil, Chaos or Order, and forge your path to dominance. Inspire devotion or instill fear—the choice is yours.

name: Old World: Wrath of Gods
description: Empires rise and fall through military might, political aptitude, and diplomatic savvy – but all know to fear, above all, the Wrath of Gods. Experience devastating natural disasters, a unique scenario that explores stories of legend, and the playable kingdom of Aksum.

name: The Directorate: Novitiate
description: Become Mercury, a powerful, magical gangster in this thrilling third-person Action RPG. Fight supernatural threats, track a serial killer across Los Angeles, and choose sides as war breaks loose.

name: Night of the Witch's Invasion
description: Defeat the evil witches, rescue the trapped bunnies, and defend the peace of the town!

name: Piczle Cross: Rune Factory
description: Experience the character, monsters and world of the Rune Factory series through nonogram logic-puzzles.

name: Anthropoda Power Fantasy
description:
Anthropoda Power Fantasy is a community project where mappers would make maps with MundyC's Adventures In Moth Sorcery mod (Also known as AIMS for short), along with it's own unique resource pack. Featuring a variety of gameplay changes, new sprites, and textures!
The final result is featuring 13 MBF21 maps of varying challenge and mapping style. Are you ready to follow Sanahaid's newest adventure?

name: Neighbors
description: A folk noir detective horror game. An old time detective trying to find out the truth behind a missing girl in a mysterious place.

name: Calcification
description: Calcification is a short exploration of waiting, losing faith, and watching all around you turn to dust. After the failure of the villain’s plan, you play as a boss in a dungeon. Abandoned by the interest of heroes you languish awaiting a fate that will never come. Made in RPG Maker MZ.

name: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread
description: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread is a FPS co-op survival horror game.

name: Moral Dilemma: The Interview
description: A fourth-wall-breaking narrative adventure. It’s interview day, and you really need this job—enough to ignore the talking printer, the anomaly corridor, and the ridiculous life-or-death trials your interviewer keeps putting you in. But deep down, you know... something here is very, very wrong.

name: Pexit 8
description:
A piece of Exit 8-like where all the anomalies are related to the penguins.A piece of Exit 8-like where all the anomalies are related to the penguins.

Horror game Penguin Hotel extravaganza

name: Search Account
description: Real Escape Game.

name: Queen of Treasure Isle
description:
Queen of treasure isle is a simple, small-scale metroidvania that mainly consists of bomb throwing and jumping.

You can retrieve the treasure hidden in various places and return home in a balloon when you are done.

name: UnderTale: DoctorTale
description:
DoctorTale is a crossover fan-game based on the sci-fi series Doctor Who (by BBC) and the RPG game UnderTale (by Toby Fox).

The plot tells of the Time Lord from Gallifrey, traveling across different planets that are imprisoned in one large Pocket Universe which is on the verge of self-destruction. In this world, you can go the way of mercy to save everyone, or you can use brute force to achieve personal freedom. You decide, the fate of the universe is in your hands.

name: The Evil D
description: Square up against THE EVIL d, the letter with the most VILE attitude you have ever seen! He’ll throw everything he has left at you in hopes of maintaining his title of the most dastardly letter alive. Will you succumb to his wrath and let him control the fate of the world as he pleases, or will you fight for all that is good? Regardless of the outcome, you best prepare yourself for the ruthlessness of THE EVIL d!

name: Undertinge
description: Play as the Wizard named Frisk. Welding magic as a weapon, you have to end the Eternal Night, destroying the heart of darkness that plagues the land, freeing the world from the wicked clutches of the ancient curse. Will you let the darkness blind you? Will you make it out alive? Well, that, my friend, is up to you to decide.

name: SCP Foundation: Universe Horror
description: Venture into the chilling world of the SCP Foundation with "SCP Foundation: Universe Horror." As a containment operative, you'll explore a realm where reality warps and unknown dangers await. Through a gripping found-footage perspective, your team must confront horrific entities, solve complex puzzles, and survive in a constantly shifting environment.

name: Dustswap: Dusttrust
description: Sin descripción

name: Undertale: Call of the Void
description: Sin descripción

name: The Gleaming Grill
description: The Gleaming Grill is a cooking, 4 player Co-Op game where you need to keep the increasing amount of customers happy to prevent your restaurant from going bankrupt. Work with your friends as fast as you can to ensure all your customers leave with a smile on their face!

name: Bad-Draw
description: This game is in the type of 2D platformer. It's about the revenge of a character made of drawings.

name: Candleholder
description:
You play as Spamton, who has fallen in a Neo Dark Fountain inside Kris's pocket, and now explores a strange, dreamy place called the Cluttersphere.

With your perspective shifted, having Jevil as your ally (?) and being tasked with protecting Kris's lifeforce in the form of a candlelight, you must use the SOUL to guide Spamton into making it back to the Dark World safely.

name: Unmourned
description: Unmourned is a first person psychological horror game where you play as Jason, a man who moves into a new house only to be haunted by escalating paranormal activities. As the disturbances grow more intense, Jason discovers that the house's previous owners mysteriously vanished. Driven by terror and desperation, Jason must uncover the truth behind the family’s disappearance and find a way to break the curse that now haunts him. Can he solve the mystery before it's too late?

name: Castlevania: The Adventure - Masque of Retribution
description:
Battle against Dracula's forces once more as Christopher Belmont in Castlevania The Adventure - Masque of Retribution!
Enhanced Visuals, smoother controls and gameplay, remixed and remastered OST, a completely overhauled set of bosses; Castlevania The Adventure - Masque of Retribution is the definitive way to play this reimagined classic by Konami!
As with the previous WarMachine Studios releases, this is a NON-PROFIT FAN REMAKE. No monies were exchanged in any way for the creation of this game. Like the others, it was done out of fun and love for a forgotten game series.

name: Tronix Carnival Games
description: Tronix Carnival Games is a rogue-like TPS gameplay in a dystopian robotic world. Set in a ruined carnival overtaken by Tronix robots, it’s now a deadly playground. Players uncover its secrets, battle enemies, and survive unique challenges.

name: Samui kara Nabe Kuitai ne Joon-chan to!!
description:
Let's complete a tasty nabe that will satisfy Joon-chan.
This is such a non-stop shiritori dark nabe simulation.
